short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts RateMyProfessors ratings directly into Cornell Class Roster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rate My Cornell Professor automatically displays each professor's ratings into the Cornell Class Roster from Rate My Professor. Instead of switching between tabs, this extension is a shortcut to see the professor's color-coded ratings.
